author: Al Jazeera
title: 'Immoral, inhuman': China blasts US over coronavirus questions
description: Beijing says comments by US politicians are 'shameless and morally repulsive' after scepticism over virus figures.
content:
China strongly criticised American officials as "shameless and morally repulsive" on Thursday for raising questions about the number of Chinese people infected and killed by the new coronavirus.
